fullname.label: User Name
fullname.description: Full name of user who launched job

rescale.label: Compute On Demand Version
rescale.description: Version of pipeline for Compute On Demand

description.label: Project Description
description.value: Samples are diluted with HG002 in order to achieve various VAF at coverage (400X, 800X, 1600X) in order to assess sensitivity

reference.label: Reference
reference.description: Name of the reference genome this sample was aligned to

PLV.label: Positive label variance (PLV)
PLV.description: Percentage of molecule labels absent in reference labels.

NLV.label: Negative label variance (NLV)
NLV.description: Percentage of reference labels absent in molecule labels

sf.label: Site SD
sf.description: Constant term in sizing error relative to reference

bpp.label: Base pairs per pixel
bpp.description: Calculated base pairs per pixel in the alignment by comparing molecules to the reference.

sr.label: Relative SD
sr.description: Quadratic term in sizing error relative to reference

totlen.label: Total length
totlen.description: The summed length all molecules in the bnx file.

avglen.label: Average length
avglen.description: The average (mean) length of the molecules.

n50.label: Molecule N50
n50.description: N50 can be described as a weighted median statistic such that 50% of the summed molecule length is contained in molecules equal to or larger than this value

labdensity.label: Label density (/100kb)
labdensity.description: The average number of labels detected per 100 kbp of molecule length.

totmapqrylen.label: Total mapped reference length
totmapqrylen.description: Sum of lengths of mapped portions of all molecules, on reference

totqrylen.label: Total mapped query length
totqrylen.description: Sum of lengths of mapped portions of all molecules, on query

avg_sf.label: Average site SD
avg_sf.description: Constant term in sizing error relative to reference

avg_sr.label: Average relative SD
avg_sr.description: Average quadratic term in sizing error relative to reference

ave_confidence.label: Average confidence
ave_confidence.description: The average alignment score for all the molecules that align to the reference

frac_aligned_len.label: Fraction aligned length
frac_aligned_len.description: Length of fraction of aligned molecules

Deletions.label: Deletions
Deletions.description: The number of segments in the genome map assembly which are shorter when compared to the reference, indicating that a deletion occurred in the segment.

Insertions.label: Insertions
Insertions.description: The number of segments in the genome map assembly which are longer when compared to the reference, indicating that an insertion occurred in the segment.

Duplications.label: Duplications
Duplications.description: The number of nonredundant segmental tandem and tandem-inverted duplication patterns found in the genome map assembly compared to the reference.

Inversion breakpoints.label: Inversion breakpoints
Inversion breakpoints.description: The number of inversion breakpoints found in the genome map assembly compared to the reference based on the observation that patterns are in opposite orientation compared to adjacent sequence patterns.

Interchr. translocation breakpoints.label: Interchr. translocation breakpoints
Interchr. translocation breakpoints.description: The number of nonredundant interchromosomal translocation breakpoints resulting in fusion between different chromosomes in the genome map assembly compared to the reference.

Intrachr. translocation breakpoints.label: Intrachr. fusion breakpoints
Intrachr. translocation breakpoints.description: The number of translocation breakpoints within a chromosome in the genome map assembly compared to the reference

Sex.label: Sex
Sex.description: Sex determined based on coverage of sex chromosomes

Median Coverage.label: Median Coverage
Median Coverage.description: Median number of molecules covering each position genome-wide

Global coefficient of variation.label: Global coefficient of variation
Global coefficient of variation.description: Coefficient of variation in coverage genome-wide

Median local coefficient of variation (2.label: Median local coefficient of variation (2Mbp)
Median local coefficient of variation (2.description: Median coefficient of variation observed within 2Mbp intervals

Percent above expected (2 Mbp window).label: Percent above expected (2 Mbp window)
Percent above expected (2 Mbp window).description: Percent difference between the expected coefficient of variation in sample with low systematic biases (2 Mbp windows) and the observed coefficient of variation in the sample. If the observed percent different is greater than 20%, the sample should be considered to contain systematic bias.

Median local coefficient of variation (6.label: Median local coefficient of variation (6Mbp)
Median local coefficient of variation (6.description: Median coefficient of variation observed within 6Mbp intervals

Percent above expected (6 Mbp window).label: Percent above expected (6 Mbp window)
Percent above expected (6 Mbp window).description: Percent difference between the expected coefficient of variation in sample with low systematic biases (6 Mbp windows) and the observed coefficient of variation in the sample. If the observed percent different is greater than 20%, the sample should be considered to contain systematic bias.

Correlation with label density.label: Correlation with label density
Correlation with label density.description: Correlation between coverage of genomic regions and the label density in the given regions. Value greater than 0.25 indicates high systematic biases and sample may have more false positive CNV calls.

Wave template correlation.label: Wave template correlation
Wave template correlation.description: Correlation between the coverage of the query sample and the coverage profiles from known samples with large systematic bias. Value greater than 0.4 indicates high systematic biases and sample may have more false positive CNV calls.
